articles.title: UK begins talks to join Asia-Pacific CPTPP trade treaty - The Guardian
articles.description: Move is key part of Liz Truss’s plan to pivot trade away from Europe after Brexit
articles.content:
The UK is beginning negotiations to join a free trade alliance with Asia-Pacific countries, a key part of its attempts to pivot trade away from Europe after Brexit.
